meanings.definition: A very large dose of a vitamin, typically exceeding the recommended daily allowance.
meanings.sent1: She decided to try a megavitamin to boost her immune system.
meanings.sent2: Taking a megavitamin every day made him feel healthier.
meanings.sent3: The doctor joked that a megavitamin a day keeps the illness away.
meanings.sent4: To her, a megavitamin was like a superhero for her health.
meanings.sent5: The concept of a megavitamin was new to her but intriguing.

meanings.definition: The practice of taking large doses of vitamins as a form of therapy or prevention.
meanings.sent1: His megavitamin regimen included various supplements.
meanings.sent2: She believed in the power of megavitamin therapy.
meanings.sent3: The group discussed the benefits of megavitamin parties.
meanings.sent4: In their eyes, megavitamin therapy was a magical solution.
meanings.sent5: The idea of megavitamin prevention fascinated him.
